room_title: Escape room "Trouble in Paradise" by Escape Zone Long Island in New York
review: My family and I (9 and 5 year Olds) took a trip and didn't know what to expect but what a great time we had! We had never done any escape room before and Brendan was the perfect amount of being helpful but not giving anything away. The room was done up completely professionally and the different challenges seem creative. We can't wait to go back now that we can strategize better.

room_title: Escape room "Trouble in Paradise" by Escape Zone Long Island in New York
review: We went with a group of 8 for my cousins birthday and escaped the paradise (or at least tried)! The staff that helped us was extremely nice and helpful. We had a blast and will definitely be back in the future! Thank you for a wonderful experience!

room_title: Escape room "Trouble in Paradise" by Escape Zone Long Island in New York
review: We had great time in the Trouble in Paradise room! Challenging but very fun! Staff is friendly and helpful.
